description: Zero-dependency, AI-first component library for Svelte 5

stageDefinitions.beta: Functional, not yet in production consumers

docLevelDefinitions.standard: Playground + header + variants + props + usage examples

components.name: Button
components.description: Primary action trigger, polymorphic (a/button)

loader.description: Rich loading state — replaces content with custom icon/text. icon is a snippet, position is 'left'|'right'

icon.description: Structured icon placement — icon is a snippet, position is 'left'|'right' (default left)

components.name: Badge
components.description: Status tag with semantic color variants, optional indicator dot, and icon support. Bordered tinted style (10% bg, 30% border, 4px radius).

label.description: Convenience text content (used when no children)

indicator.description: Show colored dot matching variant color

breaking: v2: Removed iconLeft/iconRight snippets, clickable prop. Changed from pill (9999px) to 4px radius with 1px border.

components.name: Divider
components.description: Visual separator with optional label

components.name: Avatar
components.description: User avatar with image, algorithmic Truchet fallback, initials, and status indicator

name.description: Used for initials fallback and alt text

radius.description: Border radius in px (number) or CSS value (string, e.g. '50%')

alt.description: Alt text for img element (falls back to name)

components.name: Stat
components.description: Metric display with optional progress bar

components.name: ThemeToggle
components.description: Animated sun/moon theme switcher

components.name: ThemeSelect
components.description: Three-option theme selector (light/dark/system)

components.name: Input
components.description: Text input with validation and error states

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Multiline text input with optional auto-resize

components.name: Select
components.description: Custom dropdown with keyboard navigation

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Checkbox with label via children snippet

components.name: Switch
components.description: Toggle switch for boolean settings

components.name: SearchInput
components.description: Search field with icon, clear button, loading state

components.name: Toast
components.description: Notification system via context API
components.contextSetup: createToastContext() in root, getToastContext() in children

components.name: Alert
components.description: Inline alert with icon and actions

components.name: Spinner
components.description: Loading indicator

components.name: EmptyState
components.description: Empty data placeholder

components.name: Skeleton
components.description: Loading placeholder shapes

components.name: ProgressBar
components.description: Determinate/indeterminate progress indicator

components.name: Modal
components.description: Dialog overlay with variants and fill mode

components.name: Popover
components.description: Hover popover with CSS Anchor Positioning

components.name: ConfirmDialog
components.description: Pre-built confirmation modal

components.name: Tabs
components.description: Tab navigation with animated sliding indicator

components.name: Accordion
components.description: Collapsible content sections

components.name: AccordionItem
components.description: Expandable item with title and custom indicator

components.name: NavBar
components.description: Horizontal mega-menu navigation bar

components.name: LeftBar
components.description: Collapsible sidebar with context and persistence

components.name: LeftBarSection
components.description: Grouped navigation section with title

components.name: LeftBarItem
components.description: Nav item with icon, badge, expandable subroutes

components.name: LeftBarGroup
components.description: Dynamic item group with search and avatar support

components.name: LeftBarToggle
components.description: Sidebar collapse toggle, reads LeftBar context

components.name: DropdownContainer
components.description: User account menu with theme toggle and sign out

components.name: PageHeader
components.description: Flexible page header with stats and action slots

components.name: SettingCard
components.description: Settings group card

components.name: SettingItem
components.description: Individual setting row

components.name: BottomPanel
components.description: Slide-up panel with drag-to-resize

components.name: CodeBlock
components.description: Syntax-highlighted code with Shiki and copy button

showLineNumbers.description: Show line numbers via CSS counters

components.name: IconInput
components.description: Input with leading/trailing icon slots, loading spinner, and clear button

loading.description: Show spinner in left icon slot

clearable.description: Show clear button when value present

components.name: NumberInput
components.description: Stepper input with decrement/increment buttons and min/max enforcement

components.name: Radio
components.description: Single radio button with animated dot indicator (use inside RadioGroup)

components.name: RadioGroup
components.description: Radio group container with context for child Radio components

components.name: FileUpload
components.description: Drag-and-drop upload zone with file list, size validation, and multi-file support

label.default: 'Drop files here or click to upload'

components.name: RangeSlider
components.description: Styled range input with fill bar, labels, and custom value formatting

components.name: PinInput
components.description: OTP/PIN code entry with per-digit inputs, auto-advance, and paste support

components.name: Dropzone
components.description: Single-file drag-and-drop zone with file preview and type validation

placeholder.default: 'Drag & drop a file here, or click to upload'

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: Hover/focus tooltip with arrow pointer, delay, and optional rich content snippet

components.name: Card
components.description: Bordered container with optional title and semantic color variants

components.name: Link
components.description: Polymorphic link/button with arrow icon that shifts on hover

components.name: LinkCard
components.description: Full-width clickable card rendered as anchor with label and trailing slot

components.name: LazyImage
components.description: Image with IntersectionObserver lazy loading and fade-in animation

components.name: MetricCard
components.description: Dashboard KPI card with icon, value, unit, progress bar, and auto-colored thresholds

components.name: FilterChip
components.description: Toggleable filter chip with active state indicator

components.name: StatusLine
components.description: Horizontal row of items separated by configurable delimiter

items.description: Array of strings or {text, icon} objects

components.name: MemberCard
components.description: Team member row with avatar, status dot, role, timestamp, and hover actions

components.name: DashCard
components.description: Glassmorphism dashboard section card with stagger-fade animation on mount

components.name: DistributionBar
components.description: Horizontal segmented bar with auto-calculated percentages and optional legend

components.name: Dropdown
components.description: Toggle-based action menu with click-outside dismissal and position variants

components.name: DropdownItem
components.description: Menu item button with optional icon and danger variant

components.name: DropdownDivider
components.description: Horizontal separator line for dropdown menu groups

components.name: PropsTable
components.description: Styled API documentation table with type chips and default value highlights

props.description: Array of {name, type, default?, description, required?}

components.name: SplitPane
components.description: Two-column layout with configurable ratio, responsive stacking, and optional sticky right pane

components.name: DocSection
components.description: Documentation section with heading, anchor link, and configurable heading level

components.name: Sidebar
components.description: Legacy sidebar — replaced by LeftBar

components.name: NavigationContainer
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav — unused

components.name: TabNav
components.description: Legacy tab nav — use Tabs instead

components.name: ScrollNav
components.description: Legacy scroll wrapper — unused

components.name: WorkspaceMenu
components.description: Legacy workspace switcher — unused

components.name: SidebarSection
components.description: Legacy sidebar section — replaced by LeftBarSection

components.name: SidebarItem
components.description: Legacy sidebar item — replaced by LeftBarItem

components.name: SidebarGroup
components.description: Legacy sidebar group — replaced by LeftBarGroup

components.name: SidebarPopover
components.description: Legacy sidebar popover — unused

components.name: SidebarToggle
components.description: Legacy sidebar toggle — replaced by LeftBarToggle

components.name: SidebarSearch
components.description: Legacy sidebar search — unused

components.name: SidebarGroupSwitcher
components.description: Legacy sidebar group switcher — unused

components.name: SidebarAccountGroup
components.description: Legacy sidebar account group — unused

components.name: SidebarAccountItem
components.description: Legacy sidebar account item — unused

components.name: SidebarNavigationItem
components.description: Legacy sidebar navigation item — unused

components.name: LeftBarPopover
components.description: LeftBar context-aware popover — internal

components.name: ChipNav
components.description: Internal chip navigation — used inside NavBar

components.name: NavigationSearch
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav search block — unused

components.name: NavigationSection
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav section block — unused

components.name: NavigationAccountGroup
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav account block — unused

components.name: NavigationGroupSwitcher
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav group switcher — unused

components.name: NavigationCustomBlock
components.description: Legacy enterprise nav custom block — unused

utilities.name: cn
utilities.description: Class name concatenation with falsy filtering

utilities.name: cv
utilities.description: Class variants for type-safe variant composition
